overview: A young mother of three arrives home to find her husband dead in the bath. Traumatised, she flees the scene and drives away with her kids without any real destination. She creates a new world for her and her children - a world where the youngest son can wear pretty dresses, eat waffles for dinner, swim with his clothes on, see dinosaurs everywhere... far away from the 'dangerous outside world'. She must let the memory of her husband go in order to live again.
title: Smothered
